title: Introducing o1
summary: A new series of reasoning models for solving hard problems. OpenAI o1 ranks in the 89th percentile on competitive programming questions (Codeforces), places among the top 500 students in the US in a qualifier for the USA Math Olympiad (AIME), and exceeds human PhD-level accuracy on a benchmark of physics, biology, and chemistry problems (GPQA).

title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet
summary: Our most intelligent model yet. Claude 3.5 Sonnet raises the industry bar for intelligence, outperforming competitor models and Claude 3 Opus on a wide range of evaluations.

title: Gemini 2.0 Flash: Our next era of models built for the agentic era
summary: Gemini 2.0 Flash is our most capable model yet for agentic experiences. It features native tool use, multimodal understanding, and long context.

title: Llama 3.3 70B
summary: Meta releases Llama 3.3 70B, which rivals the performance of Llama 3.1 405B with the same cost and latency as Llama 3.1 70B.

title: Claude 3.5 Haiku
summary: Our fastest model yet. Claude 3.5 Haiku matches Claude 3 Opus capabilities at the same speed and cost as our previous generation Haiku.
